```{r}
library("RCurl")
library("jsonlite")
library("dplyr")
library("here")

# Fetch dataset
url <- "https://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/machine-learning-databases/00296/dataset_diabetes.zip"
temp <- tempfile()
download.file(url, temp)
unzip(temp, exdir = here("data"))
data_path <- file.path(here("data/dataset_diabetes/diabetic_data.csv"))



```
